workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.04957220465028639 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 7.362083597997367e-05 --weight-decay 0.000880808576833846 --lr 2.7007128853773193e-05 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 168380 --max-lr 0.000708072985761835 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.9312041095381349 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.0 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
